title: Bankrupt firms: Third-party litigation funds eyeing interim finance space - Economic Times
content: Bankrupt firms: Third-party litigation funds eyeing interim finance space  Economic Times
description: In December, the RP of a Faridabad-based firm that owns a shopping mall and has a debt of over Rs 300 crore, raised interim finance to run the day-to-day operations even as the company was going through the corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP).
